channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: While studying bioinformatics in the bachelor programme at TUM and LMU I joined the group biomedical big data within the scope of an internship to gain more practical experience in the fields of Bioinformatics. As I work for Markus Hoffmann, I assist with c++ programming tasks for the development of an epistasis detection tool called GenEpiSeeker.
